Song_tekstovinet: Da je s cisteg vina morje
Lyrics_tekstovinet:
Da je s cisteg vina morje
pak da je kak' Medjimorje
lefko bi ga spil'
al' bi ipak za njom plakal
sivim sozom brk namakal, zalosten bi bil

Ma da ja imam crne kojne
ofcas bi se vozil dojne
hintov bi zastavil z mukom
brk protegnul gore z rukom
jabuku joj dal
 
Je, svega tog ja nema
 glec birtas mi stolac sprema
vu noc moram it
 zlemal bum joj gavalera
poved kog' me otec tera
pa pem dalje pit

Izmisljene misli
strazari dolaze i odlaze
na stolu izlizane karte
i miris dosade

Mi smo uvijek isti

pod klupom slicice iz maste
za ratne godine
ostani u sjeni

nad nama nemiri i svemiri
jos svicu rujna, radna jutra
i strme veceri

Posli smo na izlet skupa 
u subotu ja i Pista
srce nam od srece lupa
popili smo tri gemista

Ostavili smo decu, zene 
sobom vzeli luk i jeger
demizonke opletene
sakrili u gepek treger
 
Divan dan, zadere se Pista
i pohotno stisne volan 
otvaram vrata od dvorista
na radiju zeleni maligan

Meknite vse vse gorje 
da se bu videlo Zagorje
meknite se se gorje 
idemo vu Zagorje

Crvena Skoda po bregima juri
zavoji ko valcer becki
vino nam niz gubec curi
Pista i ja smo opet decki

Celi dan smo popivali 
vesele popevke stare
a na vecer parkrali 
pri krcmi kraj tuzne bare

Vani pala vlazna kmica 
nigdi blizu nema hize
birtija ko sada bitna 
pa nas vlece sebi blize

Pista me hudo pogleda 
u njemu nekaj prejti neda
u njega nekaj sebi vlece 
nekaj od birtije vece

Nekaj od pijace jace

EngLyrics_lyricstranslate:
My bad days I like to spend alone,
Drink and wander through bars,
But I often meet with her eyes.. Ena is a beautiful woman, Ena knows well
That those days end in crowds,
So she calls me to herself to help me.. I am not your son, Ena, remember that,
You can do that with him,
It’s too late for me.. I know that Ena would want that I’m always hers,
I guess because I go missing often,
She always keeps me in her thoughts though.. And when I wanna tell her that the end is better
Than our beys and ambushes
She just looks at me and says: yeah, yeah, yeah.. “And don’t go out without your coat,
Look around you, everything’s white, it’s cold.”. I am not your son, Ena, remember that,
You can do that with him,
It’s too late for me.. It’s been a long time and a long bey,
And even though I don’t even have a name,
I often meet Ena in my dreams.. When my bad days I spend alone here,
I meet travellers through bars,
I ask if they know her and if she’s proud.. They say that she’s still beautiful with the same posture,
But often even when she’s happy
They notice a blue shadow in her black eyes.. I am not your son, Ena, remember that,
You can do that with him,
It’s too late for me.

EngLyrics_lyricstranslate:
All my life I’ve been dreaming
that I’m setting off upriver
on an old steamboat
that’s carrying salt,. And that I carry an old
love I’ve never gotten over,
a long, thin cigar,
and a pair of golden spurs —
that I’m Shane, that I’m Shane.. Life on the frontier is dangerous and hard,
for my name here
means Justice from now on.
I hear the stories, how
death rides behind me
while I ride red
by the fires on the edge of town.
“That’s Shane, that’s Shane.”. All my life I’ve been dreaming
that I’m setting off upriver
on an old steamboat
that’s carrying tramps to the West,. And that I carry an old
love I’ve never gotten over,
a long, thin cigar,
and a pair of golden spurs —
that I’m Shane, that I’m Shane.. So long as I live this life that I never chose myself,
my soul dreams of the dry wind from the south.
I hear the din of herds,
I see a town in the distance,
and the thin image of reality grows ever thinner.. I know that life on the frontier
is dangerous and hard,
but my name here
means Justice from now on.. On my grey horse
now death rides behind me.
He leads me there
where my dear from long ago is already waiting for me.. Come out and fight.
This town isn’t big enough
for one of us.
Come out and fight. The street is empty,
but they’re watching us from the windows.
Come out and fight — I’ll take your life;
if you stay, I’ll take your honor, Shane.

EngLyrics_lyricstranslate:
Those black eyes of yours
Were always so innocent
As though it was never gonna end,
They could never see the love games,
And they never will
Until there’s nothing left but fear.
Did you really think
It was all just a game
And that I’m lonely because of you?
What are you gonna do now that you’ve hit a wall,
And there’s no pigeon at your home to caress you?. Some heavy rains are preparing to pour,
Through your window only Lonbardy polars are visible,
Above this city lightnings are flashing,
YOU ARE ASKING IN VAIN WHO’S COMING,
YOU ARE ASKING IN VAIN WHO’S COMING.
Clowns in the mountains,
Ribald through the gates.. Switch everything off,
And be happy
As love has only just begun for us.. How many times would you watch
Men return from contests,
And each would want your kiss.. One would be too rough,
The other would have too many wounds,
Neither would satisfy your arrogant heart.. The light from your windows
Often shines through till the break of dawn,
When there’s nobody outside to peek through.. Your bed is hard and the nights are long,
Come on, look what the weather is turning up to be,
And there’s no pigeon at your home to caress you.. The old guards are yawning,
Through your window only Lonbardy polars are visible,
The far away boys are singing,
YOU ARE ASKING IN VAIN WHO’S COMING,
Clowns in the mountains,
Ribald through the gates.. Some heavy rains are preparing to pour,
Through your window only Lonbardy polars are visible,
Above this city lightnings are flashing,
YOU ARE ASKING IN VAIN WHO’S COMING,
YOU ARE ASKING IN VAIN WHO’S COMING.
